meaningMnemonic: The <radical>moon</radical> <radical>table</radical> is a table that's made entirely of <kanji>skin</kanji>. You thought the table was made of moon, with all those pores and such, but when you look more closely, you realize it's skin. Disgusting, porous, skin.
readingMnemonic: But, when you go to touch this "moon table" made of <kanji>skin</kanji>, you realize that it's <reading>harder</reading> (はだ) than you expected.
